arguments.name: x
arguments.description: The x position of the image

arguments.name: y
arguments.description: The y position of the image

arguments.name: [w]
arguments.description: The width of the image, if not specified, using source width

arguments.name: [h]
arguments.description: The height of the image, if not specified, using source height

doc.name: image
doc.description: Draw an image to the screen
